definitions.definition: The length of a single cycle of a wave , as measured by the distance between one peak or trough of a wave and the next ; it is often designated in physics as λ , and corresponds to the velocity of the wave divided by its frequency .
A person's attitude and way of thinking as compared to another person's.
examples: I think you and I are on a different wavelength .

main_definition: ( physics ) The length of a single cycle of a wave , as measured by the distance between one peak or trough of a wave and the next ; it is often designated in physics as λ , and corresponds to the velocity of the wave divided by its frequency .
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) A person's attitude and way of thinking as compared to another person's.
